videos.title: Yoga in Space 1 -  Making an Astronaut Yoga Plan (Shorter edit) 🧑‍🚀 I Cosmic Kids Special Project
videos.description:
In this version of the episode we jump straight into the yoga after a short intro for those days when you just have to get moving! 😁

Jaime has been contacted by a real life astronaut with the European Space Agency! Samantha Cristoforetti is going to space soon and wants to do yoga while she is there. Can we help? Jaime creates a special yoga plan for her that SHE IS GOING TO DO IN SPACE! Do the yoga with Jaime - and stand by to see Samantha doing our yoga plan once she goes to the International Space Station!

🚀 You can download our FREE astronaut yoga plan (with classroom activities) here: http://cosmickids.com/yogainspace/

videos.title: Hulk | Superhero Kids Yoga in Space
videos.description:
We explore Hulk's special powers and, through our yoga, learn how to use them in our own lives.

Superhero Kids Yoga in Space unpacks the special skills that superheroes have and helps kids learn how to use them in their own lives. Superheroes aren't all about the CRASH BANG KAPOW! There's also lots for kids to learn from them about character, mindfulness and capability. Hulk shows us the importance of self-regulation. We learn the value of honesty from Wonder Woman, teamwork from Black Widow and the power of innovation from Iron Man.
Featuring six brand new episodes Superhero Kids Yoga in Space captures imaginations and helps kids feel stronger physically, mentally and emotionally. This app-exclusive series is a brand new type of Cosmic Kids yoga adventure.

videos.title: Breathing Exercises for Kids 😮‍💨 | Cosmic Kids Breathing Adventure!
videos.description:
Teach Your Kids the Power of Breath with our Fun and Easy Breathing Exercises for Kids Video! In this video, your child will learn the art of deep breathing through a series of simple and playful exercises that help them to relax, focus, and manage their emotions. With colorful animations, clear instructions, and engaging visuals, your child will discover the benefits of breathing techniques, including improved concentration, reduced stress, and increased self-awareness. Whether your child is dealing with anxiety, hyperactivity, or just needs a moment of calm, this video is sure to provide them with a fun and effective way to tap into the power of their breath.

Join Jaime on a breathing adventure taking you through a series of beneficial and fun breathing exercises through the magic of a story!

In collaboration with the University of Plymouth and Nottingham NHS.

videos.title: How Kids Can Deal With Bereavement | Cosmic Kids Zen Den
videos.description:
In this 10 minute film, Jaime explains how hard it can be when someone we know dies and how all our feelings get jumbled up. She helps you to process these emotions by doing something positive and creating a memory box. 

This film is for children who have lost someone, but it can also help all kids better understand and respond to loss amongst their friends and wider community.

If a child you know in the UK has been affected by bereavement, or the death of the Queen, and would like to speak to someone, Grief Encounter’s national, free and confidential helpline, grieftalk, is open 9am - 9pm every weekday on 0808 802 0111 for advice, guidance and grief support. 

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

videos.title: Teddy & Tabs | A Cosmic Kids Yoga Adventure! TW⚠️ This video explores bereavement and death
videos.description:
TW: This video explores bereavement. A yoga adventure led by Jaime - all about losing a friend. Teddy and Tabs are two cats who have grown up and shared their whole lives together. Until one day, Tabs gets ill and very sadly, dies. We then follow what Teddy goes through in his grief to learn what sort of feelings arise, and how Teddy manages the whole experience.

With thanks to Grief Encounter, a UK children’s bereavement charity, for their time and expertise to  learn the best approaches and practices for counselling kids through grief.

videos.title: Batman | Superhero Kids Yoga in Space!
videos.description:
Superhero Kids Yoga! Jaime explores Batman's special skills and, through our yoga, we learn how to use them in our own lives!

Superhero Kids Yoga in Space unpacks the special skills that superheroes have and helps kids learn how to use them in their own lives. Superheroes aren't all about the CRASH BANG KAPOW! There's also lots for kids to learn from them about character, mindfulness and capability. Hulk shows us the importance of self-regulation. We learn the value of honesty from Wonder Woman, teamwork from Black Widow and the power of innovation from Iron Man.

Watch the rest of the series and many more videos on the Cosmic Kids app: https://app.cosmickids.com

videos.title: VISUALISATION! - Day 1 Mental Health Superpower for #childrensmentalhealthweek
videos.description:
Here's a super easy mental health tool to help kids (and grown-ups) deal with big feelings and reduce anxiety!  Download the Mental Health Superpowers Pack here 👉 
https://cosmickids.com/mental-health-superpowers/ 

Visualization can be beneficial for kids' mental health by helping them to:

Manage stress and anxiety: Visualization techniques, such as guided imagery, can help kids to relax, manage stress, and cope with anxiety by imagining peaceful and calming scenes.

Improve self-esteem and confidence: Visualization can help kids to develop positive self-talk, build confidence, and visualize success in different areas of their lives.

Promote positive emotions: By using visualization to focus on happy and positive experiences, kids can develop a more optimistic outlook, increase feelings of happiness and gratitude, and improve overall well-being.

Encourage relaxation and mindfulness: Visualization techniques can help kids to calm their minds and be more present in the moment, reducing stress and promoting relaxation.

videos.description:

In this exciting and fun-filled video, your child will join the Cosmic Kids Yoga Adventure and help Rapunzel on her quest to save the prince. But watch out for the pirates! Your child or class will have to complete the Pirate Yoga Challenge, a series of pirate-inspired yoga poses that will test their strength, balance, and agility. This video is part of the popular Cosmic Kids Yoga Adventure series, which combines storytelling, movement, and mindfulness to create an immersive and engaging experience for children. Suitable for kids of all ages, this video is perfect for family time, classroom activities, or as a fun and healthy way to get your child moving.

videos.title: Old Macdonald Had a Farm - Kids Yoga! 🐮🐥 🐷🐴  #shorts #nurseryrhymes #kidsworkout
videos.description:
Sing Along and Stretch to Old MacDonald Had a Farm!

A Fun Kids Yoga Adventure! In this delightful video, your child will sing along to Old MacDonald  had a farm, on his farm with Jaime. A classic nursery rhyme while learning some fun and easy yoga moves! With our expert yoga instructor, your child will follow along with simple movements that match the lyrics of the song, such as the Downward Dog for the dog, the Cow Pose for the cow, and the Cat Pose for the cat. This video is a great way to combine music and movement to promote physical activity and mindfulness in children. In this heartwarming and uplifting video, we show kids how to use the power of hugs and positive self-talk to overcome negativity and feel good about themselves. In this video, kids are transported to a Minecraft world where they'll follow along with a Jaime as she leads them through a series of simple yoga poses. The poses are inspired by characters and objects from the game, so kids will love the fun and playful approach to yoga.

By incorporating the game that they love, it's an innovative way to encourage kids to try yoga and embrace the benefits of mindfulness and self-care.

videos.title: Incy Wincy Spider Pose 🕷️🕸️  Enjoy being a wiggly bendy spider! #shorts #kidsworkout  #spider
videos.description:
Are you looking to add a new pose to your yoga practice? Check out this short demonstration of Spider Pose! In this video, our certified yoga instructor will guide you through the steps to achieve this challenging yet effective pose.

Spider Pose is a variation of the traditional low lunge pose that helps to stretch and strengthen the muscles in the legs, hips, and back. It's a great way to improve flexibility and increase blood flow to the lower body.

In this video, our instructor will break down the steps to achieve Spider Pose, providing modifications for beginners and tips for those who are more advanced in their practice. They'll demonstrate proper alignment and offer guidance on how to get the most out of the pose.

So whether you're a seasoned yogi or just starting out, thanks for watching our short demonstration of Spider Pose! Take a few minutes out of your day to learn something new and improve your yoga practice. Your mind and body will thank you!

videos.description:
¡Bienvenidos a nuestra Aventura de Yoga Encanto! En este video, le daremos vida a la magia de Encanto a través de posturas de yoga divertidas y atractivas que están diseñadas específicamente para niños.

Inspirándonos en los amados personajes y el encantador mundo de la película, aprovecharemos nuestra fuerza interior, gracia e imaginación, mientras fluimos a través de secuencias de yoga que nos ayudarán a desarrollar flexibilidad, equilibrio y atención plena.

Si eres fanático de los videos de Encanto para niños o simplemente buscas una forma divertida e imaginativa de mover tu cuerpo, esta práctica de yoga es perfecta para ti. Así que toma tu tapete de yoga y únete a la familia Madrigal en esta mágica aventura hacia un cuerpo y una mente saludables.

En este video, exploraremos el mundo mágico de Encanto a través de posturas de yoga diseñadas para inspirar y levantar el ánimo. Cada postura está inspirada en un querido personaje de la película, desde la personalidad enérgica de Mirabel hasta la fuerza de Louisa y la perfección de Isabella.

¡Así que ven y únete a nosotros mientras fluimos a través de esta encantadora aventura de yoga Encanto!

videos.title: How to cope with BIG FEELINGS 🐠 This is a children's mental health superpower! 🦸🏻‍♀️ #mentalhealth
videos.description:
A short video that can help kids manage big feelings. As parents and caregivers, it's important to understand that children experience a wide range of emotions, including anger, sadness, fear, and anxiety. In this short video, we share 'be the pond' - a brilliant strategy for teaching kids how to manage big feelings in a healthy and productive way. Kids mental health videos can be challenging, but this method breaks down how our emotions can work in our minds in a simple way - with each emotion a fish, swimming around. So, if you're looking for some practical advice on how to help children navigate their emotions, then the full video is a must-watch. Just search for Cosmic Kids - Be The Pond. Let's get started!

Are your kids looking for a fun and energetic way to get moving? Look no further than the Troll's Dance for Kids! This entertaining and lively dance routine is part of our Cosmic Kids Trolls Yoga Adventure, and is sure to have your little ones busting a move and giggling with delight.

The dance is easy to follow and perfect for kids of all ages and skill levels. With silly antics and plenty of high energy, this dance routine is part of our yoga adventure, and is sure to be a hit with your kids.

Not only is the Troll's Dance for Kids and our Trolls Yoga Adventure a great way to get your children up and moving, but it also provides a fun opportunity for them to exercise their imaginations. As they dance alongside the lovable trolls, they can let their imaginations run wild and pretend they're on a magical adventure.

So, clear some space in your living room and get ready to dance! Your kids will love learning the Troll's Dance, and you'll love watching them have a blast. Don't forget to share this video with your friends and family so they can join in on the fun too!

videos.title: Breathe with me! Breathing Exercises for Kids! | Cosmic Kids
videos.description:
Welcome to our fun and engaging breathing exercises for kids video! In this video, we will guide your child through some easy and effective techniques to help them calm down, focus, and relax.

Trace the line of your fingers with a breath in on the way up and a breath out on the way down. This is a super easy way to clear your mind and calm yourself down in an instant. Do it now and put it in your back pocket as a tool you can use whenever you need it. 

Breathing exercises are an excellent way to help children manage stress, anxiety, and difficult emotions. These exercises can also improve concentration, boost energy, and enhance overall well-being.

These finger breathing exercise is perfect for kids of all ages and can be done anywhere, anytime. Whether your child needs to calm down before bed or focus before a big test, these techniques will help them feel centred and grounded.

So, grab a mat and join us for some fun breathing exercises for kids! Don't forget to subscribe to our channel for more helpful videos like this one.

videos.title: How the caterpillar became a butterfly...With a handstand!  #shorts
videos.description:
Try this kids yoga pose video themed around the beloved children's book, The Very Hungry Caterpillar by Eric Carle! In this video, we will be practicing the butterfly pose, a perfect pose to stretch our legs and calm our minds, just like a butterfly preparing to take flight.

After chomping through our cocoon, we'll hop it up using our legs into a handstand, before sitting to uncurl our wings and show off all the beautiful colours.

As we hold this pose, we will imagine ourselves transforming, just like the very hungry caterpillar in the book. We will picture ourselves growing and changing, just like the caterpillar does as it eats and eats, before finally becoming a beautiful butterfly.

This pose is perfect for children of all ages and abilities, and can be done at home, in the classroom, or even outside in nature. So come join us as we practice the butterfly pose and celebrate the beauty of transformation, just like the Very Hungry Caterpillar!

Remember to always listen to your body and go at your own pace. And don't forget to breathe deeply and relax in this peaceful pose. We hope you enjoy this video and have fun practicing yoga!

videos.title: Coo Coo with Super Power Pigeon Breaths! #shorts #breathingexercises
videos.description:
There's no better way to help your kids find inner strength than by trying our Superpower Pigeon Breaths tutorial video! In this fun and engaging video, we'll show you how to do the Superpower Pigeon Breaths, a special breathing technique that can help you feel brave and confident.

Jaime will guide you through each step of the Superpower Pigeon Breaths, showing you how to breathe deeply and slowly while puffing up your chest and imagining yourself as a powerful and courageous pigeon. We'll also include some fun sounds as we exhale, coo-ing in the most authentic pigeon way!

Learning how to do Superpower Pigeon Breaths is a great way to help manage anxiety and stress, and to feel more confident in challenging situations. Whether you're feeling nervous about a big test, playing in a team sport or just need a little extra boost of courage, Superpower Pigeon Breaths can help!

So grab a comfortable spot and get ready to learn how to do Superpower Pigeon Breaths like a pro! Don't forget to subscribe to our channel for more fun and educational videos for kids.

videos.title: A STAR WARS kids yoga adventure! 💪 May the 4th Be With You! 🌌 #shorts #starwars
videos.description:
May the 4th be with you! 💪

A long time ago in a Galaxy far, far away... we made not one but two STAR WARS kids yoga adventures! 🌌

I'm a huge fan of all the Star Wars films and it's amazing to think how many generations have enjoyed this series since the first film was released back in 1977! That's 45 years ago! 😳 Another statistic that has blown my mind is that both of these adventures have been watched 5.6 million times, for a total watch time of 110 YEARS! 🤯 That's a LOT of kids doing yoga! 

We know how much kids love our Movie-themed adventures - so this month we'll be doing a bit of a 'Movie May' recap, sharing some of our most popular adventures based on films 🎥 🎞️ 

I wonder what movie-inspired adventure we should do next! 🤔

videos.title: YOGA IN SPACE! 🧑‍🚀🚀 - Watch yoga being done on the International Space Station #shorts
videos.description:
In this amazing YouTube video, we'll take you on a journey to outer space. We join astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti on the International Space Station doing Cosmic Kids Yoga in zero gravity!

You'll get to watch as Samantha gracefully moves through a series of yoga poses designed especially for kids. And as you follow along with Samantha, you'll get a chance to imagine yourself floating weightlessly through space, just like an astronaut!

Not only is this video a fun and exciting way to learn yoga, but it's also a unique opportunity to see what life is like for astronauts in space. You'll get a glimpse of the amazing work they do and the challenges they face in the zero-gravity environment.

So, grab your yoga mat and get ready to blast off into a whole new world of yoga with astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti and Jaime in space!

You can find the full video on our channel here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xWPBTqW3ipI

Download your FREE Yoga in Space resource pack here! https://cosmickids.com/yogainspace/

videos.title: How to get kids to be calm and relaxed in the car 🚗 Try this #breathing exercise for kids! #shorts
videos.description:
Do your kids ever feel anxious or stressed during car rides? Well, I have a fun trick to help kids stay calm and relaxed - it's called petal breaths!

To start, hold out one hand and make a closed fist. As you breathe in slowly through your nose open up your palms nice and wide. As you breathe out, you close them up like a tulip bulb! 

You can do this exercise quietly in the car to feel instantly calmer and more relaxed. Try it out a few times until you can feel the difference in your breathing and body. Petal breathing is a cool tool to help you manage stress not just in the car, but in lots of other situations too!

So next time you're feeling anxious in the car, remember to take a deep breath and give petal breathing a try. You got this!

videos.title: Learn your ABC with these yoga poses! ✈️⛵️🐈 #shorts #alphabet
videos.description:
Introducing a unique and engaging way for kids to learn their ABCs - through yoga poses!

Each letter of the alphabet can be represented by a corresponding yoga pose. For example, "A" can be represented by the "Aeroplane" pose, where kids can stretch their arms and legs into an aeroplane shape. "B" will be represented by the "Boat" pose, where kids can make the shape of a boat while seated on the floor. The letter "C" can be demonstrated with "Cat" pose - where we are on our hands and knees, arching our backs - like a cat! 

As we go through each letter, we'll provide step-by-step instructions and demonstration of each pose, making it easy and fun for kids to follow along. Not only will they be learning their ABCs, but they'll also be developing their flexibility, strength, and coordination skills.

Whether your child is a yoga enthusiast or new to the practice, this is perfect for kids of all ages and skill levels. By incorporating yoga poses into their ABC learning, kids will have a blast while getting some exercise and improving their cognitive abilities at the same time.

So, grab your yoga mat and get ready to have fun as we explore the alphabet through yoga poses! Check out all of our videos for the alphabet on our channel, or go on a yoga adventure!

videos.title: Breathe with Jaime in the back of the car! #shorts #breathing - Finger Breathing Exercise
videos.description:
If your kids have ever felt anxious or stressed during car rides, then I have a fun trick to help them stay calm and relaxed - it's called finger breathing!

To start, hold out one hand and use the index finger of your other hand to trace up the outside of your fingers as you breathe in slowly through your nose. Then, trace down the inside of your fingers as you breathe out slowly through your mouth.

You can do this exercise quietly in the car without anyone even noticing. Try it out a few times until you feel more calm and relaxed. Finger breathing is a cool tool to help you manage stress not just in the car, but in lots of other situations too!

So next time you're feeling anxious in the car, remember to take a deep breath and give finger breathing a try. You got this!

videos.title: Do this to activate your self belief! YOU CAN DO IT! #shorts #affirmations
videos.description:
Activate your self belief! 💪

In this super fun video, we're going to teach you how to activate your self belief by saying positive affirmations out loud to yourself.

Positive affirmations are like magic words that can help you feel happy, confident, and awesome! We'll teach you some cool and easy affirmations to say like "I am strong", "I believe in me", and "I can do anything".

We'll also show you how to say these affirmations out loud, with confidence and excitement! The more you say them, the more you'll start to believe them and feel amazing.

And the best part is, you can say these affirmations anytime, anywhere - in the morning, before bed, or whenever you need a quick boost of positivity.

So, let's get started and say some positive affirmations out loud together! Get ready to feel awesome!

videos.title: How can we handle our emotions? Let's Be the Pond!
videos.description:
Check out this Happy Hack for Mental Health Awareness Month from Jaime at Cosmic Kids! Being the Pond is the perfect way to think about our emotions, how many of them we have and how they work. 

We imagine our emotions as different fish, swimming around our minds (the pond!). There's a happy fish, a sad fish, a sleepy fish, a calm fish, a kind fish, a selfish fish, an angry fish and more... So many fish swimming around the pond. By learning to 'be the pond', we can just watch our different feelings swimming by. Every feeling is welcome. Let's be the pond, and see what kinds of feelings we're feeling!

videos.title: How to Feel Focused - Let's practice Body Scanning!
videos.description:
When you're focused on the thing that you're doing, you are most likely to get it done. And do it well - happy days! 

To get good at focusing, practice Body Scanning!

Imagine your focus is a torch light. Shine your light on each part of your body one at a time. Start with your feet and work up slowly. Not forgetting your arms, your hands and your face! I like to do this, lying on the sofa - and it's really relaxing too. Try it yourself!

videos.title: What makes The Incredible Hulk incredible? Let's learn about self-regulation! #shorts
videos.description:
How can we teach kids about self-regulation?

Talking to kids about how to manage their emotions can be SUPER boring for them! So we've made things interesting with our SUPERHERO Kids Yoga in SPACE series! 🪐 

In the Hulk episode, we think about the super powers that Dr. Bruce Banner has (aka, the Incredible Hulk!). As well as being super strong, Hulk is very intelligent - but he can only access this when he is calm! This is a really great way to teach kids about self regulation. By thinking about how the Hulk manages his emotions, kids can understand that being calm helps us to think straight! 💪🧠

We have a whole inspiring superhero series that you can find on our App, but this Hulk episode is on YouTube too! The kids will LOVE this!

videos.title: How can we manage our energy levels? ⚡ Try this Cosmic Kids Zen Den!
videos.description:
Our Zen Den videos are all about making mindfulness relevant for kids and helping them develop a healthy awareness of their emotions. 🧘

We've just released a brand new Zen Den about energy levels and how we can manage them. 

Sometimes it's great to have loads of energy and whizz around like Sonic the Hedgehog! Other times, we might need a steadier, calmer energy like Kevin the Koala.

It's good for kids (and us grown-ups too!) to know how to check-in with our energy levels every now and again and adjust them for the moment we find ourselves in.

If you want to find this new Zen Den episode, then it's on the Cosmic Kids app right now!

videos.title: My Little Pony Breathing Exercise for Kids!  🌬️🌈  #shorts
videos.description:
Breathing exercises are brilliant mindfulness tools that can help us all navigate the ups and downs of life. Check out this My Little Pony breathing exercise for kids!  🌬️🌈

Watch the full episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ucqYUEKGILM

Teaching kids multiple breathing exercises (like petal breaths and finger breathing) gives them a toolkit to access when they are feeling overwhelmed or anxious.

Deep breaths can help them calm down, release tension, and regain their cool. It's like a superhero cape for emotional regulation! 🦸‍♂️🌪️ Here's a clip of me teaching the petal breathing exercise in the My Little Pony yoga adventure and shows just how fun it can be to learn breathing techniques! Then, these tools simply become part of kids lives!

When doing one of these exercises, we can hit the pause button on life and find joy in the simplest of things. ✨🌈
It's a life skill that will serve kids now, and in the future. 🌬️🌟

videos.title: What do we mean by 'be the pond'? #mindfulness #shorts
videos.description:
Be The Pond is our second most shared video on YouTube (second only to our Frozen yoga adventure, which is a classic of course!). The reason Be The Pond is shared so often by parents and teachers is because it's such a simple and effective mindfulness tool. 

Talking to kids about big feelings and how they can properly process and understand them isn't easy, but be the pond can really help. I actually use this mindfulness tool even as a grown up all the time! 

I get loads of messages about how their kids or class have reminded them when they feel frustrated or anxious to 'be the pond' 💜 🐟

Here's a wonderful clip of Cosi explaining a bit more about 'be the pond' and how it works in practice! 

A huge THANK-YOU to @christinasonthemove over on Instagram for sharing and of course to Cosi (aka @crushofthestingingwasp!) 💜 

Screentime that gives kids SUPERPOWERS!

videos.title: What is a Peace Out? Jaime from Cosmic Kids explains! ✌️
videos.description:
Peace Outs are our wonderful guided relaxations. They're perfect for helping kids to relax, build confidence and feel safe. Peace Outs take us to lovely places in our minds to help us feel good. They work as audio only if you want a non-screen bedtime option, or you can use them with visuals, with minimal and very chilled out graphics. 

Lots of people use Peace Outs as bedtime stories, but they are great for de-stressing and helping kids feel good about themselves at any time.

To find them, just search for Cosmic Kids Peace Out on YouTube or download our app using the links below!

videos.title: Why did Jaime start Cosmic Kids Yoga? 🧘‍♀️ Jaime explains more at the NHS ConfedExpo
videos.description:
One of the things I was asked about at the NHS ConfedExpo was why I started Cosmic Kids.

For me, it was all about giving kids access to a brilliant physical and mental health toolkit at a much younger age. This was something I felt that I personally didn’t have. 

This really was what prompted me to hit the publish button on my very first YouTube video - Squish the Fish more than ten years ago! For me it's all about getting as many kids around the world to get the incredible physical and mental benefits of yoga and mindfulness! 🌈🧘‍♂️💪

Here's a clip of me speaking at the Expo about why I started Cosmic Kids all those years ago. 💙

videos.title: How to make good choices 🧠 ✅ - Mindfulness video for kids
videos.description:
Have you ever struggled to get kids to make good choices?

I love teaching the 'traffic light' technique. This is a really simple mindfulness technique that we can all use! 🚦

It works by teaching us to think 'red light', and stop when our emotions start to cloud our thinking and judgement. 🔴

Then think 'amber', where we pause, and take a breath or two while we think about how we can respond more positively to the situation. 🟠 

Once we've done this, we get the green light! 🟢

This is a simple but effective way of thinking about how to make good choices, and is a really useful mindfulness video for kids! You can find the full episode on the Cosmic Kids app.

videos.title: 3 Fun Easy Breathing Exercises for Kids! #shorts #kidsyoga #breathing
videos.description:
In this fun short video, we invite your little ones to join Jaime and try three easy and enjoyable breathing exercises. Designed to help kids relax, focus, and manage emotions, these exercises are perfect for all ages.

The Straw Breath 🥤: With each sip through the magical straw, kids will not only have a blast but also learn the importance of deep breathing for relaxation, focus, and staying calm in any situation.

Volcano Blowing Breath 🌋: Get ready for sparkly lava giggles! Kids will practice taking deep breaths to erupt with a Trolls style sparkly volcano. It's a delightful way to encourage deep breathing while having lots of fun.

Tumble Dryer Breath 🐺: Let your little ones unleash their inner wolf! They'll learn to take a deep breath in and then huff and puff with a super long exhale to try and blow the house down! It's a great exercise to release pent-up energy and stress.

Like, subscribe, and breathe easy with our Fun Breathing Exercises for Kids video today!" 🎈🎉

videos.title: Why are some people mean? 😡 - Zen Den
videos.description:
Why are people mean? 

This is such a challenging thing for kids to get their heads around sometimes. Even when you have been nothing but kind, people can be mean for what seems like no reason at all!

In this Zen Den, I try and explain a bit more about why people can be mean, and that it doesn't mean you've done anything wrong! But if people are mean, then we need to really try our best to not catch the mean bug so that we don't end up passing it onto someone else! 

If you've not tried them yet, check out some of our other Zen Den episodes that are packed full of mindfulness for kids 🧘‍♂️ "

To watch the full adventure, just search for 'Arnold the Ant' or visit our channel for more fun kids yoga adventures!

videos.title: It's a Beauty and the Beast Kids Yoga Adventure! 🥀
videos.description: We've just launched a brand new Kids Yoga Adventure - Beauty and the Beast! If your kids love this classic fairytale story, then they are sure to enjoy our full yoga adventure. Join Jaime as she tells the story of the Beast, Beauty, Gaston and the witch.

videos.title: How To Talk So Kids Will Listen - 5 TOP TIPS! 🤯
videos.description:
How To Talk So Kids Will Listen - Jaime shares 5 TOP TIPS! 

Talking to kids in a way that ensures that they will listen to you is a huge challenge. In this short video, Jaime shares 5 of her top tips to get kids to listen to you when you speak to them. This includes getting on their level, using more positive language and giving choices. Jaime is the world's most popular kids yoga teacher, getting millions of kids to listen in and follow along during yoga adventures and mindfulness sessions. Whether it's resolving conflicts, nurturing self-expression, or simply connecting on a deeper level, these invaluable tips to get kids to listen will revolutionize your parenting journey.

videos.title: How To Get Your Kids To Sleep Fast! 😴
videos.description:
Bedtime just got easier with Jaime's quick tips To Get Kids To Sleep FAST 😴 

Say goodbye to tossing and turning as Jaime shares her favourite techniques that whisk kids into dreamland in no time. From calming breathing exercises to soothing bedtime routines, Jaime's got the sleep secrets that work like magic to get kids to sleep quickly. Unleash the power of relaxation and bid farewell to restless nights. With Jaime's expert tips, sweet dreams are just a few moments away! 

If you need more help getting little ones to sleep - then check out our Cosmic Kids Sleep Adventures and Peace Out meditations! The PERFECT prelude to bedtime!

videos.title: HELP! Poppy Troll Gets Stuck in a SPIDER WEB! 🕷️🕸️
videos.description: Poppy finds herself in a sticky situation when she encounters a spider web! Through imaginative storytelling and playful yoga poses, we'll help Poppy find her way out and stretch our bodies to get untangled! It's a creative blend of yoga, storytelling, and laughter that keeps kids engaged while promoting flexibility and movement. Get ready to untangle the web and embark on a fun-filled yoga journey with Jaime and Poppy Troll! Watch the full episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U9Q6FKF12Qs&vl=en-GB

Let's meet Belle and flex muscles like Gaston, as we embark on a whimsical journey that promotes movement, creativity, and mindfulness. It's an interactive and fun way to introduce kids to the beloved tale while fostering flexibility and focus. Let's unlock the magic of yoga with Belle and Gaston! 🌹🧘‍♀️

videos.title: How to be Kind - How to Teach Kids to be Kind 🙏
videos.description:
Jaime explains how to be kind, and how we can teach kids to be kind 🙏 

It's so important to teach kids to be kind. To do it, they need role models and to understand that being kind is a choice that they can make every single day. It's a choice that impacts others that we speak to, and can make them feel good as well as ourselves when we are kind to one another. From small acts of kindness to embracing others, this video is all about fostering a culture of kindness and respect. Let's plant the seeds of compassion and watch them blossom! 🌼💕

videos.title: Who is making a mess of the garden?! 🐒😤
videos.description:
Can we find out who is making a mess of Rocky the Rabbit's garden? It looks like there might be a Cheeky Monkey to blame! 

Rocky the Rabbit is a brilliant kids yoga adventure from Cosmic Kids. Join Jaime as we solve the messy garden mystery and learn all about why it's important to keep things as we find them and to tidy up after ourselves.

videos.title: Buttons the Lazy Monkey is Throwing Trash! 🙊 🗑️
videos.description: Buttons is throwing his trash out of his tree! We need to teach him a lesson in clearing up after himself. Join Jaime and Rocky the Rabbit in this kids yoga adventure where we learn about why it's important to not litter and why we should clean up after ourselves!

videos.title: ¡Es HARRY POTTER YOGA! ⚡🧙
videos.description: Adéntrate en el mundo mágico con HARRY POTTER YOGA! ⚡🧙 - un fragmento encantador de nuestra Aventura de Yoga para Niños de Harry Potter. Únete a nosotros en un viaje lleno de encanto mientras combinamos la atracción de Hogwarts con los beneficios del yoga. A través de posturas creativas y narraciones hechizantes, tus pequeños abrazarán a su mago o bruja interior. Desde lanzar hechizos hasta volar en escobas, es una aventura cósmica que promueve el movimiento, la imaginación y la atención plena. Prepárate para conjurar algo de magia del yoga mientras nos sumergimos en el mundo de Harry Potter. 🪄📚🧘‍♂️

videos.title: Hogwarts Meets Yoga In This Magically Fun Workout for Kids! ⚡🧙
videos.description: Step into the wizarding world with HARRY POTTER YOGA! ⚡🧙 . Check out this magical clip from our enchanting Harry Potter Kids Yoga Adventure! Join Jaime for a whimsical journey as we combine the allure of Hogwarts with the benefits of yoga. Through creative poses and spellbinding storytelling, your little ones will embrace their inner wizards and witches. From casting spells to flying on broomsticks, it's a cosmic adventure that promotes movement, imagination, and mindfulness. Get ready to conjure some yoga magic as we dive into the world of Harry Potter! 🪄📚🧘‍♂️

videos.title: The Sleepy Train 🚂 - A Kids' Sleep Meditation Adventure
videos.description:
Embark on a dreamy journey aboard The Sleepy Train 🚂 with our Kids Sleep Meditation video. 🌙🌟 

Join Jaime as she guids your little ones on a soothing and imaginative ride into dreamland. Through gentle relaxation techniques and calming visualizations, we'll help create a peaceful environment that promotes relaxation and prepares them for a restful night's sleep. Let the magic of 'The Sleepy Train' carry your children to a world of sweet dreams and tranquil slumber. All aboard for a night of serenity and peaceful rest! 😴🌠

videos.title: How to Help Kids with Nightmares | Cosmic Kids Zen Den
videos.description: In this Zen Den episode, Jaime explores How to Help Kids with Nightmares in a short and calming video. 🌙💫 Nightmares can be scary, but fear not! Jaime will guide your little ones through gentle techniques to soothe their worries and bring them comfort at bedtime. With relaxation exercises and peaceful visualizations, we'll empower kids to find a sense of calm and relaxation after a spooky dream. Join us in this Zen Den session as we turn nightmares into peaceful dreams, nurturing mindfulness and providing tools for a peaceful night's sleep. 🌌😴

videos.title: Breathing Techniques To Help Kids With Nightmares
videos.description:
Jaime shares some powerful techniques to Help Kids with Nightmares in this Zen Den episode. 🌙💫 

Nightmares can be unsettling, so Jaime has compiled effective kid-friendly tools and strategies to ease your child's fears and promote peaceful sleep. From calming breathing exercises to comforting bedtime rituals, these techniques are designed to soothe and provide comfort during nighttime worries. Join us on this journey of compassion and care, and equip your child with the tools they need to conquer their dreams and embrace restful nights. Let's transform bedtime into a time of tranquility and sweet dreams! 🌌😴

videos.title: Moon Salutation Yoga Flow with Bop the Alien! 👽
videos.description: Escape to another planet with a Moon Salutation Yoga Flow! Join Jaime and Bop the Alien 👽 on this before bed yoga adventure. Bop needs to get home to bed, and this moon salutation yoga sequence helps him catch a ride home on the moon! This celestial yoga adventure can be found on the Cosmic Kids Yoga App, promoting relaxation, balance, and a connection to the cosmos before bedtime. Get ready to reach for the stars and embrace the tranquility of the moonlit night with this magical yoga moon salutation flow! 🌠👾

videos.title: La Guerra de las Galaxias - ¡con YOGA! 🌌🔫
videos.description: ¡Aventúrate a una galaxia muy, muy lejana donde La Fuerza no es la única energía que se canaliza! Únete a Luke, Leia e incluso a Darth Vader mientras intercambian sables de luz por esterillas de yoga, buscando el equilibrio interno en medio de batallas interestelares. Desde las salutaciones al sol en Tatooine hasta las posturas congeladas en Hoth, descubre cómo la atención plena y la meditación pueden despertar verdaderamente la Fuerza interior. Experimenta las sagas épicas y las batallas espaciales como nunca antes: con respiraciones profundas, estiramientos y una galaxia de zen. ¡Que la paz esté contigo! 🧘‍♂️✨🪐

videos.title: Year of the Dragon Yoga! ✨🐉 #shorts
videos.description:
Did you know the story behind the dragon's place in the Emperor Jade's legendary race that created the Chinese Zodiac? Despite being able to fly and swim, the mighty dragon finished fifth. Why, you ask? 🤔🏁

The dragon, ever so kind and helpful, spotted a village in need during the race. Despite its lead, it stopped to bring rain to the villagers, aiding them in their time of drought. Then, on its way to the finish line, the dragon saw the rabbit struggling to cross a river and gently helped it across. 🌧️🐇

This tale teaches us the importance of kindness, compassion, and the true spirit of helping others, even when we're racing towards our own goals. The dragon's fifth place is a reminder that winning isn't always about being first; it's about doing what's right. 🏆❤️

I loved making this episode because I got to give the animals in the race a fun voice to help make each character's story more memorable - I went with a smart London accent for the dragon! 🐉
The full Lunar New Year episode is on YouTube and our app too. 

#YearOfTheDragon #ChineseNewYear #KindnessMatters

videos.title: Sitting down Kids Yoga Tree Pose! 🌳🧘‍♂️ #shorts
videos.description:
Discover a new twist on a classic pose, and try the Sitting Down Kids Yoga Tree Pose! 🌳🧘‍♂️ 

Join Jaime on our Kevin the Koala bedtime yoga adventure, as we explore the beloved Tree Pose (Vrksasana) from a whole new perspective – while sitting down!

This unique adaptation of the Tree Pose is perfect for young yogis who are just starting their practice or for those looking for a gentle alternative. By performing the Tree Pose while seated, children can focus more on the pose's alignment and the balance between the body and mind, without the challenge of standing on one leg. 🍃✨

videos.title: Dealing with Difference #mindfulness #mindsetmatters
videos.description:
A short clip taken from our Zen Den episode, 'Dealing with Difference'. In this episode, we learn about how to understand others that are different from ourselves, and that we need to ask questions to find out more about each other. 

By asking questions, rather than focussing on our differences, we can find that we have lots in common that we all enjoy.

videos.title: A BRILLIANT Listening Game for Kids 👂 #mindfulness #shorts
videos.description:
Try this fun listening game for kids, where we close our eyes and listen carefully to work out what the sounds are that we can hear. 

By focussing our minds only on what we think we can hear, we learn to engage our listening skills. 

For more mindfulness videos, take a look at our Zen Den series and subscribe for more.

videos.title: Cat-Cow Pose 🐱🐄 - Marjaryasana-Bitilasana #yoga
videos.description:
Flow with Jaime from Cosmic Kids Yoga as she demonstrates the Cat-Cow Pose! Marjaryasana-Bitilasana, or Cat-Cow Pose, is a gentle yoga sequence that helps to warm up the spine, relieve back tension, and improve flexibility. This dynamic movement between arching and rounding the back is perfect for enhancing your posture and releasing stress.

videos.title: Cosmic Kids Yoga Adventures & Stories for Kids Age 3-9+ - Interactive Livestream! 🔴
videos.description:
Fun Kids Yoga Adventures with Jaime - Live Compilation! 🌟

Jaime combines storytelling, movement and fun in these brilliant Cosmic Kids Yoga adventures. Many of these adventures are based on stories you might already know, like Moana, Frozen, Trolls and more! Others are original stories, with original characters.

Every episode unfolds a marvelous adventure in yoga, transforming ordinary exercise and stretching into an extraordinary experience! It allows you to be in the stories with your favourite characters. Tailored to nurture balance and mindfulness, each session is a gateway to a vibrant rainbow of positivity and well-being. 🌈🧘‍♂️✨ #KidsYoga #LiveYogaAdventure #KidsMindfulness
